_header: God that is in heaven bright
Subjects: prayers, for protection; prayers, asked on behalf of scribes
_description: Prayer for the bearer of a book — one couplet

HunHM139.Transcription:
God that ys in heuen brychsaue hym that thys boke me bore daye ande
                    nych
HunHM139.Note:
Added to originally blank leaf by a hand of the sixteenth
                    century.
